mapper.select: select * from board ORDER BY board_no DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}
select * from board ORDER BY board_land, board_no DESC
select * from board ORDER BY board_theme, board_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into board (board_id, board_sub, board_count, board_content, client_nick1, board_date, board_land, board_theme, board_img, board_thumb) values (2,#{board_sub}, 0, #{board_content}, #{client_nick1}, now(), #{board_land}, #{board_theme}, #{board_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_thumb, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update board set board_sub=#{board_sub}, board_content=#{board_content}, board_land=#{board_land}, board_theme=#{board_theme}, board_img=#{board_img}, board_thumb=#{board_thumb} where board_no=#{board_no}
